Package interfaces

Interface ICustomerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerService
public interface ICustomerService
This interface provides the methods related to customer actions in a Fastfood Ordering and Management System. It provides functionality to manage orders, menu items, and payment methods for customers.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Boolean
    collectOrder(int OrderID)
    Allows a customer to collect a ready order by marking it as completed.
    BranchMenuItem
    getBranchMenuItem(int branchID, String itemName)

    Retrieves a list of menu items available at a specific branch.

    getBranchName(int branchID)
    Gets the name of a branch based on its identifier.
    int
    getNextOrderID()
    Retrieves the next available order ID to be used when creating a new order.

  • Method Details

    • getOrder

      Order getOrder(int OrderID)
      Retrieves an order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      OrderID - The unique identifier of the order.
      Returns:
      The Order object if found; otherwise, null.

    • newOrder

      void newOrder(Order order)
      Records a new order into the system.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to be added.

    • getBranchMenuItemList

      List<BranchMenuItem> getBranchMenuItemList(int BranchID)
      Retrieves a list of menu items available at a specific branch.
      Parameters:
      BranchID - The unique identifier of the branch.
      Returns:
      A list of BranchMenuItem objects.

    • collectOrder

      Boolean collectOrder(int OrderID)
      Allows a customer to collect a ready order by marking it as completed.
      Parameters:
      CustomerID - The unique identifier of the customer.
      Returns:
      A list of Order objects.

    • getNextOrderID

      int getNextOrderID()
      Retrieves the next available order ID to be used when creating a new order.
      Returns:
      The next order ID as an integer.

    • getBranchName

      String getBranchName(int branchID)
      Gets the name of a branch based on its identifier.
      Parameters:
      branchID - The unique identifier of the branch.
      Returns:
      The name of the branch.

    • updateBranchMenuItem

      void updateBranchMenuItem(BranchMenuItem item)
      Updates the details of a specific menu item in a branch's menu.
      Parameters:
      item - The BranchMenuItem object containing the updated details to be saved.

    • getBranchMenuItem

      BranchMenuItem getBranchMenuItem(int branchID, String itemName)
      Retrieves a specific menu item from a branch based on the item's name.
      Parameters:
      branchID - The ID of the branch where the menu item is located.
      itemName - The name of the item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The corresponding BranchMenuItem object if found, or null if no item matches.

    • getPaymentMethods

      List<PaymentMethod> getPaymentMethods(String type)
      Retrieves a list of payment methods available for a specific type (e.g., credit card, online payment).
      Parameters:
      type - The type of payment methods to retrieve (e.g., "Credit/Debit Card", "Online Payment").
      Returns:
      A list of PaymentMethod objects that match the specified type.

    • getReadyTime

      LocalDateTime getReadyTime(int OrderID)
      Retrieves the time when an order was marked ready for collection.
      Parameters:
      OrderID - The unique identifier of the order.
      Returns:
      The estimated time when the order will be ready.

    • setOrderStatus

      void setOrderStatus(int OrderID)
      Sets the status of an order to indicate that it is ready for collection.
      Parameters:
      OrderID - The unique identifier of the order.
